titleStmt.title: By the Mayor. We charge and command you, that vpon S. Thomas day the Apostle next comming, you doe hold your wardmote and that you haue afore vs at our generall Court of Aldermen to bee holden in the Guildhal, the Munday next after the feast of the Epiphany next comming, ...
Acts & Orders
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Robert Young, printer to the Honourable Citie of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Steele notation: hold which 2) furtherance. 3) pitie) of.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
